title: Crash Course | Introduction to Cassandra for Developers
description:
This Crash Course will guide you through the basics of Apache Cassandra and help you understand distributed database systems.
‚ûî Register for Astra: https://astra.dev/cassandra-course

üìñ Hands-On Exercises: https://github.com/datastaxdevs/workshop-intro-to-cassandra
‚úç Cassandra introduction Katacoda course: https://katacoda.com/datastax/courses/cassandra-intro

0:00 - Cassandra Fundamentals
12:41 - Exercise: Create an Astra DB Instance
16:22 - Tables, Partitions, and Examples
30:34 - Exercise: Create a Table
33:58 - The Art of Data Modeling
51:03 - Exercise: CRUD Operations
1:06:07 - Resources

CONNECT WITH DATASTAX

Twitter: https://twitter.com/datastaxdevs

About DataStax:
DataStax is the company behind the massively scalable, highly available, cloud-native NoSQL data platform built on Apache Cassandra‚Ñ¢. DataStax gives developers and enterprises the freedom to run data in any cloud, Kubernetes, hybrid or bare metal at global scale with zero downtime and zero lock-in. More than 450 of the world‚Äôs leading enterprises including Capital One, Cisco, Comcast, Delta Airlines, Macy‚Äôs, McDonald‚Äôs, Safeway, Sony, and Walmart use DataStax to build transformational data architectures for real-world outcomes. For more, visit DataStax.com and @DataStax.

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra¬©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.
